plot: Three isolated dramas come together in the end as they collide in one single event. The emotional state of the characters involved are translated into surreal dance sequences, the inescapable here and now.
title: Emotion
plot_es: Three isolated dramas come together in the end as they collide in one single event. The emotional state of the characters involved are translated into surreal dance sequences, the inescapable here and now.
